column5: A few months ago, we won the $1000 from the Oshawa This Week draw, and decided to finally upgrade our front door. Our contractor that did a great job on our windows and doors (thanks to another OFC member) is missing in action!  Anyone here have any recommendations for a door installer in Durham Region please send me a PM! Just wanna get a nice front door and storm door. Thanks.  Please don't recommend home depot
